lines.text: Oh, thank you, he's from around here. Uh, What's your- What's your name?
What is the name of this place?
Kabuki-cho in Shinjuku. It's known as the dark side of Tokyo.
Then that will be my name.
Is there a good place to stay around here?
If you go south for two blocks there's several. Pretty cheap if you plan to live around here.
